page.title: 16RELIGION BEULAH - GARTH
page.content: One Church in Wales - Llanlleonfel, part of a group of parishes including Llangammarch, Llanfechan & Llanganten, with Vicar resident at Llanganten. Morning communion service held every fortnight, 10 members at present. Sunday School held in Garth Village Hall every Sunday morning, well supported. One licensced lay reader of Church in Wales resident in block. Beulah Chapel- one of a group of Con- gregational Chapels including Olewydd, Garth and Troedrhiwdalar. Now no resident minister but services held fortnightly with visiting ministers. Roughly 40 members on books but attendance averages 10. No Sunday School but Church Sunday School held in Beulah Reading Room each Friday evening.One R.C. family attend church at Builth. Graveyards at both churches
